message: Let's start fair. I take most of the money, but you get a small share to get us going. What do you say?
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more for being the one to make the first proposal
I'm willing to be more flexible this time, but I need a bigger share to compensate for the inflation. This is my final offer. Let's end this game.
I'll give you a bigger share, but I think I deserve a larger cut to make up for the lost value
